overview: Made by The National Film Board 1947.  Directed by Catherine Duncan. Christmas in Australia is a mid summer festival, with temperatures rising high.  Over the years many of the traditional northern hemisphere Christmas customs have been modified to fit the climate. Cool drinks have taken the place of hot refreshments and much time is spent out of doors but the spirit of Christmas is unchanged and Santa Clause still arrives with snow glistening in his beard!
title: Christmas Under the Sun
